name: 'Here' and 'There' Movies Multiple Choice Quiz | Name the Movie | 10 Questions

questions.text: In what movie would you find the character Sergeant Milt Warden?
questions.explanation:
From Here to Eternity.

	This 1953 movie won the Academy Award for Best Picture.  Starring Burt Lancaster, Montgomery Clift, Frank Sinatra and Debra Kerr.

questions.text: This 1970 Western/Comedy movie was set in 1883 Arizona.
questions.explanation:
There Was a Crooked Man.

	This movie stars Kirk Douglas as the leader of a band of outlaws.  The rest of the gang gets killed off in a shoot-out and has to hide the $500,000 he and the gang stole.  Henry Fonda co-stars as Sheriff/Warden Lopeman.

questions.text: Robert Montgomery plays boxer Joe Pendleton in this 1941 comedy movie.
questions.explanation:
Here Comes Mr. Jordan

	Joe Pendleton wasn't scheduled to die, so he is put back into a business moguls body.  Remade as "Heaven Can Wait" starring Warren Beatty.

questions.text: In what movie would you find a character named Chance?
questions.explanation:
Being There.

	This 1979 comedy stars Peter Sellers as Chance, a gardener who only knows about the real world from what he sees on TV.  He becomes a well respected man after a car collision with a wealthy woman (played by Shirley Maclaine) who mistakes him for highly intelligent man.

questions.text: What movie was about a former basketball player in search of a top basketball player recruit?
questions.explanation:
The Air Up There.

	Kevin Bacon stars as a former basketball player  searching in Africa for a top notch basketball recruit to help him become a successful coach.  Paul Michael Glaser (of "Starsky and Hutch" fame) directed this movie.

questions.text: This 1951 comedy/musical starred Bing Crosby as a newspaperman wanting to adopt war orphans.
questions.explanation:
Here Comes the Groom.

	Directed by Frank Capra, Bing Crosby wants to adopt war orphans but he must marry within a week.  He plans on marrying his longtime sweetheart (played by Jane Wyman) but is faced with obstacles.

questions.text: This movie is based on boxer Rocky Graziano's autobiography.
questions.explanation:
Somebody Up There Likes Me.

	Paul Newman stars as Rocky Graziano in this 1956 movie.  The film depicts the teen-aged Rocky and his struggle to the top.

questions.text: This Farrelly Brother production starred Ben Stiller, Cameron Diaz and Matt Dillon.
questions.explanation:
There's Something About Mary.

	After Ted (Ben Stiller) loses his chance with the girl of his dreams (Cameron Diaz), he sets out to find her with the help of a detective (Matt Dillon).

questions.text: This 1945 movie was based on the Agatha Christie novel.
questions.explanation:
And Then There Were None.

	Ten characters are brought together on a remote island off the English coast only be to stalked and murdered.  Starring Barry Fitzgerald and Walter Huston.

questions.text: This 1970 comedy starred Peter Sellers and Goldie Hawn as lovers.
questions.correct: There's a Girl in My Soup
options: There's a Lady in My Soup
There's a Fly in My Soup
There's a Woman in My Soup
questions.explanation:
There's a Girl in My Soup.

	Peter Sellers stars as Robert Danvers, a television cooking show host. Goldie Hawn plays a bride-to-be who leaves the groom at the altar.
